title: Simple Salmon Burgers
ingredients: ['450g tinned salmon, drained and flaked', '2 eggs', '4 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley', '2 tablespoons finely chopped onion', '4 tablespoons Italian seasoned dry breadcrumbs', '2 tablespoons lemon juice', '1/2 teaspoon dried basil', '1 pinch crushed chillies', '1 tablespoon vegetable oil', '2 tablespoons light mayonnaise', '1 tablespoon lemon juice', '1 pinch dried basil']
